dialog: SELF:Hmm.... The body is quite stiff.
SELF:It seems that the suspected suicide occurred at least 6 hours ago.
SELF:The wallet contains a 20 dollar note, various cards, and a photo of a stylish women holding her large belly.
SELF:A good-ole fashioned .22 calibre revolver. Maximum 10 loads, one missing.
SELF:Strange that he would use that kind of power.
SELF:If not done correctly, it could potentially prolong the death.
SELF:These things look new. Very high quality.
SELF:Must be some kind of gaming computer.
SELF:It looks absolutely horrible, and doesn't even seem comfortable.
SELF:The thing is caked with dust - how long has it been sitting there?
SELF:Shelves are caked with dust. Apparently, no one saw fit to put stuff on it.
SELF:Looks like students aren't too keen on reading, if they are busy playing games.
SELF:Great to know that this school is big on literature.
SELF:What a large TV this is.
SELF:What is it even used for? There's nothing to watch anyways - there's no box!
SELF:I heard from a friend that, the more monitors you had, the more professional you are at programming.
SELF:It seems that they're really tight on security here.
SELF:Makes sense, given the amount of money invested.
SELF:Maybe there'll be some recorded footage of what actually happened.
SELF:Warning: watching footage would leave the area. Are you sure you want to go to campus security to watch it?
